item.title: Items in Action
item.author: sunsp.gis@gmail.com (Shipeng Sun)
item.description: This is an ongoing list of items in actions, aka list of TODO items. So often, some good directions that deserve serious investigations and explorations have to be put off. This blog is trying to make a record of these resources. Open Geospatial Data White House Transparency and Open Government Open data: an international comparison of strategies Harvard CGA China Data Links USGS Data Quality Assurance Best Practice and Examples
